DOC.brief_title: Web-based Collection Data Obesity Health Behavior
DOC.detailed_description: In study potential participant log Amazon Mechanical Turk website worker HIT approval rate least 90 % allow view participate study . If potential participant agree participate study accept HIT , participant ask complete brief survey ( approximately 150 question ; see sample survey `` supporting document '' ) various decision making task ( e.g. , delay discounting assessment , reinforcer valuation assessment etc. ) . This survey accompany task solicit : ( ) general demographic information gender , age , income , education ; ( b ) information health health behavior practice , eat habit , alcohol cigarette use ; ( c ) question food preference value food ; ( ) information valuation immediate versus distant events/rewards .
